attributes.action: Scrap Tv License It Shouldn't Be A Legal Requirement.
attributes.additional_details:
The money only goes to the BBC
Attacking vulnerable people to pay
Cost for the year to increase from £145.50 to £150
attributes.background: TV licence should be abolished, and not a legal requirement. Viewers are paying for tv providers such as Sky, Virgin, NowTv ect. TV License should be inclusive why are we paying to watch TV in our own homes plus paying our TV providers? What is the purpose of TV License?
